news.title: Google Quietly Rolls Out Combined Audience Targeting for Search Campaigns
news.description: Google Ads users can now take advantage of a feature called combined audience targeting, which allows them to show ads only to people in two or more particular groups.

news.title: Google Ads Editor Gets New Features & Support For New Campaign Types
news.description: New tools for Google Ads users include the ability to share negative keyword lists across accounts, and to search for particular errors throughout all accounts and campaigns.

news.title: New SERP Feature Truncates Title Tag in Favor of Location
news.description: Google seems to be rolling out a new feature that automatically adds locations to title tags in place of some of the text, even if the location was not in the original title tag text.
